articles.title: Stocks fall Thursday ending holiday week lower; Twitter sheds 1.7% after Musk bid
articles.content: U.S. stocks finish lower Thursday, booking weekly declines in a holiday-shortened week, as investors digest results from major Wall Street banks.

articles.title: Why Apple Stock Fell Today
articles.content: Supply-chain issues could weigh on the tech titan's near-term results.

articles.title: Can Apple Overcome Weak Demand For iPhone SE And Supply Disruptions For Its Other Products?
articles.content:
As some parts of China went into lockdowns, Apple Inc.'s (NASDAQ: AAPL) supply chain partners had to shutter operations. This has engendered fears regarding whether the tech giant can produce enough to meet surging demand for its hardware products.
What Happened:  Apple's budget model iPhone SE assembled by Taiwanese contract manufacturer Pegatron is "in stock" on the company's online stores in several countries even after the China lockdown, TFI International Securities analyst Ming-Chi Kuo said in a tweet.
The Apple analyst noted that demand for the product has been weak. In late March, the analyst lowered his iPhone SE shipment forecast for 2022 from 25-30 million to 15-20 million.
Pegatron, according to the analyst, ...Full story available on Benzinga.com

articles.title: Meta (FB) to Charge 50% Cut From Virtual Sales in Horizon
articles.content: Meta Platforms (FB) intends to charge a nearly 50% cut from the sale of digital assets in its emerging metaverse, creating backlash in NFT trading community.

articles.title: SAP Overhauls Services and Support Portfolio to Boost Uptake
articles.content: SAP's services and support portfolio includes solutions like SAP MaxAttention and SAP Enterprise Support along with recently-added embedded launch activities and SAP Business Journeys solutions.

articles.title: ANSYS (ANSS) Set to Acquire OnScale for Undisclosed Terms
articles.content: ANSYS' (ANSS) acquisition of OnScale will have no material effect on the company's financial statements in 2022.

articles.title: Will the FAANG Stocks Beat This Earnings Season?
articles.content: All eyes will be on the FAANG stocks in the next 2 weeks but can they keep their momentum or will they disappoint?

articles.title: Helping Investors Understand Cash Flow
articles.content: Motley Fool senior analyst John Rotonti continues his discussion on the most important financial statements, focusing on the cash flow statement and what it reveals to investors.

articles.title: Netflix (NFLX) Set to Report Q1 Earnings: What to Expect?
articles.content: Netflix's (NFLX) first-quarter 2022 results are expected to reflect continued demand for media content and strength in original content offering amid intense competition.

articles.title: Meta May Already Be Set Up to Fail in the Metaverse
articles.content: Meta has made the right statements publicly to be a metaverse leader, but its actions leave a lot to be desired.
